file.title: AMM PART II-1285 - CHAPTER 52-74-01-04 - SERVICE-DOOR WARNING MICROSWITCHES - REMOVAL/INSTALLATION

page.data: AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL SERVICE-DOOR WARNING MICROSWITCHES - REMOVAL/INSTALLATION EFFECTIVITY: ALL 1. General A. This section gives the procedures to remove and install the microswitches of the warning system of the service door. B. These procedures are applicable to the four microswitches of the service door. C. The procedures in this section are given in the sequence below. The tasks identified with ( ♦) are part of the Scheduled Maintenance Requirements Document (SMRD). TASK NUMBER DESCRIPTION EFFECTIVITY SERVICE DOOR WARNING MICRO- ALL 52-74-01-000-801-A SWITCHES - REMOVAL SERVICE DOOR WARNING MICRO- ALL 52-74-01-400-801-A SWITCHES - INSTALLATION EMB-145 - AMM 1285 General 52-74-01 Page 1 of 6 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 52-74-01-000-801-A EFFECTIVITY: ALL 2. SERVICE DOOR WARNING MICROSWITCHES - REMOVAL A. General (1) This procedure gives the instructions to remove the microswitch of the warning system of the service door. B. References REFERENCE DESIGNATION AMM MPP 06-45-00/100 - COMPONENT LOCATION C. Zones and Accesses ZONE PANEL/DOOR LOCATION 821 Service door D. Tools and Equipment Not Applicable E. Auxiliary Items Not Applicable F. Consumable Materials Not Applicable G. Expandable Parts Not Applicable H. Persons Recommended QTY FUNCTION PLACE 1 Does the task Service door I. Preparation SUBTASK 841-002-A (1) Open the service door. (2) Remove lining panels 821AW, 821BW, and 821CW ( AMM MPP 06-45-00/100). J. Removal (Figure 401) SUBTASK 020-002-A (1) Disconnect the two splices (2) to disconnect the electrical wires (1). (2) Cut and remove the tiedown strap (3) (if applicable). (3) Remove the two nuts (4) and screws (6) that attach the microswitch (5). EMB-145 - AMM 1285 000-801-A/400 52-74-01 Page 2 of 6 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL (4) Remove the microswitch (5). EMB-145 - AMM 1285 000-801-A/400 52-74-01 Page 3 of 6 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL EFFECTIVITY: ALL Microswitch - Removal/Installation Figure 401 B C A ZONE 821 B 4. NUT (2) DET. A 5. MICROSWITCH 6. SCREW (2) 4. NUT (2) 3. TIEDOWN STRAP 2. SPLICE 5. MICROSWITCH 6. SCREW (2) 1. ELECTRICAL WIRE 2. SPLICE 4. NUT (2) 6. SCREW (2) DET. B 3. TIEDOWN (TYPICAL) 2. SPLICE STRAP DET. C 5. MICROSWITCH 145AMM520117.MCE A EMB-145 - AMM 1285 000-801-A/400 52-74-01 Page 4 of 6 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 52-74-01-400-801-A EFFECTIVITY: ALL 3. SERVICE DOOR WARNING MICROSWITCHES - INSTALLATION A. General (1) This procedure gives the instructions to install the microswitch of the warning system of the service door. B. References REFERENCE DESIGNATION AMM MPP 06-45-00/100 - COMPONENT LOCATION SERVICE DOOR WARNING MICROSWITCHES - AMM TASK 52-74-01-700-801-A/500 FUNCTIONAL TEST SERVICE DOOR WARNING MICROSWITCHES - AD- AMM TASK 52-74-01-820-801-A/500 JUSTMENT C. Zones and Accesses ZONE PANEL/DOOR LOCATION 821 Service door D. Tools and Equipment Not Applicable E. Auxiliary Items Not Applicable F. Consumable Materials SPECIFICATION DESCRIPTION QTY (BRAND) MS3367-4-9 Tiedown strap AR G. Expandable Parts Not Applicable H. Persons Recommended QTY FUNCTION PLACE 1 Does the task Service door I. Installation (Figure 401) SUBTASK 420-002-A (1) Put the microswitch (5) in its installation position. (2) Install the two screws (6) and nuts (4) to attach the microswitch (5). (3) Connect the electrical wires (1) with the splices (2). EMB-145 - AMM 1285 400-801-A/400 52-74-01 Page 5 of 6 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL (4) Install the tiedown strap (3) to attach the electrical wires (1) to the service door structure (if applicable). J. Follow-on SUBTASK 842-002-A (1) Do a functional test ( AMM TASK 52-74-01-700-801-A/500) and adjustment (AMM TASK 52-74-01-820-801-A/500), of the warning microswitches of the service door. (2) Install lining panels 821AW, 821BW, and 821CW ( AMM MPP 06-45-00/100). (3) Close the service door. EMB-145 - AMM 1285 400-801-A/400 52-74-01 Page 6 of 6 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.
